MGnify-BiATA-2020¶

These are the materials that will be used for the “Analysing metagenomic assemblies using MGnify” workshop, carried out as part of the BiATA (Bioinformatics: from Algorithms to Applications) 2020 conference.

  • Assembling data
    • Prerequisites
    • Part 1 - Quality control and filtering of the raw sequence files
  • Assembly analysis
    • MGnify hands-on exercises
  • VIRify pipeline
  • MAG generation

Assembling data
